entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
